lead_paragraph: The response came after a report said a group of political fund-raisers linked to the mayor had violated campaign finance laws.

byline.contributor: J. David Goodman and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Lawyer for Fund-Raisers Tied to de Blasio Fires Back at Elections Board
headline.main: Lawyer for Fund-Raisers Tied to de Blasio Fires Back at Elections Board

snippet: The response came after a report said a group of political fund-raisers linked to the mayor had violated campaign finance laws.
abstract: Laurence D Laufer, lawyer for fund-raisers linked to New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, responds vociferously to New York State Board of Elections report accusing team of illegal fund-raising; asserts 'flagrant' violations cited in agency's report were in fact legal.
